data.name: Buoy
data.detailed_description: The main character returns to his native planet after an unsuccessful journey to explore and colonize Mars. Waking up in space after a cryogenic sleep, it turns out that after the cataclysm that occurred on planet Earth, nature is on the verge of extinction, all people died from a devastating pandemic of fungus around the world. You will have to survive and return the former beauty of your native planet.
data.about_the_game: The main character returns to his native planet after an unsuccessful journey to explore and colonize Mars. Waking up in space after a cryogenic sleep, it turns out that after the cataclysm that occurred on planet Earth, nature is on the verge of extinction, all people died from a devastating pandemic of fungus around the world. You will have to survive and return the former beauty of your native planet.
data.short_description: After the cataclysm that occurred on planet Earth, nature is on the verge of extinction, all people died from a devastating pandemic of fungus around the world. You will have to survive and return the former beauty of your native planet.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains violence and caveman themed nudity. In-game nudity, blood, player-made signs, voice chat and text chat can be disabled from the in-game options menu.
